document_data.name: Garn
document_data.mainbody: '''Garn''' was a treasure hunter in th [[Moonwood]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], Garn, his twin [[Dran]], and [[Lisstra]] followed [[Karrik]] to explore the ruins of [[Methegrist]].
document_data.Relationship: Garn was the twin brother of Dran. Like his twin, Garn was totally loyal to Karrik.
document_data.Personality: Garn was the quiet one of the twins, but in truth he always had no idea about what to do.
